mapper.select: select dept_id, count(*) as studentCount, avg(total_score) as avgScore, max(total_score) as maxScore, min(total_score) as minScore from biz_county_exam_student where exam_id = #{examId} and status = '1' group by dept_id
mapper.insert: insert into biz_county_exam_student (exam_id, student_id, dept_id, class_info, total_score, theory_score, tech_score, status, submit_time) values (#{examId}, #{studentId}, #{deptId}, #{classInfo}, #{totalScore}, #{theoryScore}, #{techScore}, #{status}, #{submitTime})
